fields.label: Task Instructions
fields.description: Instructions for what the agent should do.

fields.label: Secrets
fields.description: Dictionary of secrets to be used by the agent. Secrets are safely encrypted before storing in the database.

fields.label: Allowed Domains
fields.description: List of domains that the agent is allowed to visit. Add domains as individual text fields. If not set, the agent will be allowed to visit all domains (not recommended if you are using secrets).

fields.label: Save Browser Data
fields.description: If set to True, the browser cookies and other data will be saved. Cookies are safely encrypted before storing in the database.

fields.label: Structured Output JSON
fields.description: If set, the agent will use this JSON schema as the output model.

fields.label: Use Adblock
fields.description: If set to True, the agent will use an adblocker.

fields.label: Use Proxy
fields.description: If set to True, the agent will use a (mobile) proxy.

fields.label: Highlight Elements
fields.description: If set to True, the agent will highlight the elements on the page.

fields.label: Included File Names
fields.description: File names to include in the task.

fields.label: Browser Viewport Width
fields.description: Width of the browser viewport in pixels.

fields.label: Browser Viewport Height
fields.description: Height of the browser viewport in pixels.

fields.label: Max Agent Steps
fields.description: Maximum number of agent steps to take.

fields.label: Enable Public Share
fields.description: If set to True, enables public sharing of the task execution.
